meaningMnemonic: This word consists of kanji with hiragana attached. Because the hiragana ends with an う sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>sunlight</kanji>, so the verb is <vocabulary>to shine</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to glitter</vocabulary>. Just imagine what happens when sunlight hits things!
readingMnemonic: Remember how you learned the reading for 光? Well this is almost the same thing. Just change the り to る and you'll know this reading!
